QAPair.Question: Do you have information about Immunoelectrophoresis - urine
QAPair.Answer: Urine immunoelectrophoresis is a lab test that measures immunoglobulins in a urine sample. Immunoglobulins are proteins that function as antibodies , which fight infection. There are various types of these proteins that fight different types of infections. Some immunoglobulins can be abnormal and may be due to cancer. Immunoglobulins can also be measured in the blood .
